description: Consolidated First Year Syllabus (Physics & Chemistry Cycles)

all_subjects.title: Mathematical Foundation for Computer Science Stream-1
Mathematical Foundation for Civil, Electrical and Mechanical Engineering stream-1
Mathematical Foundation for Civil, Electrical and Mechanical Streams - 2
Quantum Physics and Computation for Computer Science Engineering Stream
Quantum Physics and Sensors for Electronics Engineering
Physics of Materials for Electrical Engineering
Physics of Structural Systems for Civil Engineering
Physics of Materials for Mechanical Engineering Stream
Applied Chemistry for Emerging Electronics and Futuristic Devices
Applied Chemistry for Advanced Metal Protection and Sustainable Energy Systems
Applied Chemistry for Sustainable Structures & Material Design

detailed_syllabus.course_title: Mathematical Foundation for Computer Science Stream-1

modules.title: Matrices and System of Linear Equations
modules.content: Echelon form, rank of a matrix, Gauss-elimination, approximate solution by Gauss-Seidel method. Eigenvalues and eigenvectors, Rayleigh's power method.

modules.title: Multivariable Calculus
modules.content: Partial differentiation, total derivatives, Jacobian, Taylor's and Maclaurin's series expansion for two variables.

modules.title: Vector Calculus
modules.content: Scalar and vector fields. Gradient, divergence and curl. Curvilinear coordinates: Cylindrical and Spherical polar coordinates.

modules.title: Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs) of First Order
modules.content: Bernoulli's differential equations. Exact and reducible to exact differential equations. Applications: Orthogonal trajectories, Newton's law of cooling.

modules.title: Ordinary Differential Equations of Higher Order
modules.content: Higher-order linear ODEs with constant coefficients, method of variation of parameters, Cauchy's and Legendre's differential equations.

detailed_syllabus.course_title: Mathematical Foundation for Civil, Electrical and Mechanical Engineering stream-1

modules.title: Matrices and System of equations
modules.content: Echelon form, rank, Gauss-elimination, Gauss-Seidel method. Eigenvalues and eigenvectors, Rayleigh's power method.

modules.title: Calculus of One Variable
modules.content: Polar coordinates, polar curves, angle between radius vector and tangent. Curvature and Radius of curvature.

modules.title: Multivariable Calculus
modules.content: Partial differentiation, total derivatives, Jacobian, Taylor's and Maclaurin's series. Maxima and minima.

modules.title: Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs) of First Order
modules.content: Bernoulli's differential equations. Exact and reducible to exact differential equations. Orthogonal trajectories.

modules.title: Ordinary Differential Equations of Higher Order
modules.content: Higher-order linear ODEs with constant coefficients, Inverse differential operator, variation of parameters.

detailed_syllabus.course_title: Quantum Physics and Computation For Computer Science Engineering Stream

modules.title: QUANTUM MECHANICS
modules.content: de-Broglie hypothesis, Heisenberg's uncertainty principle. Schrödinger's wave equation, Particle in a one-dimensional potential well.

modules.title: Electrical Properties Of Metals And Semiconductors
modules.content: Quantum Free Electron Theory, Fermi energy, Fermi factor. Introduction to Semiconductors, Hall effect.

modules.title: Superconductivity
modules.content: Meissner effect, Type-I and Type-II superconductors. BCS Theory, Josephson junction, SQUIDs, MAGLEV vehicle.

modules.title: Photonics
modules.content: LASERs: Einstein's A and B coefficients. He-Ne LASER. Optical Fiber: Numerical aperture, Attenuation.

modules.title: QUANTUM COMPUTATION
modules.content: Moore's law, Qubit properties, Bloch sphere. Dirac Notation, Pauli matrices, Quantum Gates (NOT, Z, Hadamard, CNOT, Toffoli).

detailed_syllabus.course_title: Quantum Physics and Sensors for Electronics Engineering

modules.title: Quantum Mechanics
modules.content: de-Broglie hypothesis, Heisenberg's uncertainty principle, Schrödinger's wave equation, Particle in a box.

modules.title: Electrical Properties Of Metals And Semiconductors
modules.content: Quantum Free Electron Theory, Fermi energy, Semiconductors, Hall effect.

modules.title: Superconductivity
modules.content: Meissner effect, BCS Theory, Josephson junction, SQUIDs, MAGLEV.

modules.title: Photonics
modules.content: LASERs, He-Ne LASER, Optical Fiber principles, Attenuation, Fiber optic sensors.

modules.title: Semiconductor Devices And Sensors
modules.content: Direct/Indirect band gap, Photodiode, LDR, RTD, Piezo-electric sensors, MOS sensors.

detailed_syllabus.course_title: Physics of Materials for Electrical Engineering

modules.title: Quantum Mechanics
modules.content: de-Broglie hypothesis, Heisenberg's uncertainty principle, Schrödinger's wave equation.

modules.title: Electrical Properties of Metals And Semiconductors
modules.content: Quantum Free Electron Theory, Fermi energy, Semiconductors, Hall effect.

modules.title: Superconductivity
modules.content: Meissner effect, BCS Theory, Josephson junction, SQUIDs.

modules.title: Dielectric and Magnetic Materials
modules.content: Polarization, Clausius-Mossotti relation. Ferromagnetic materials, Weiss's domain theory, Hysteresis.

modules.title: Thermoelectric and Electrical Engineering Materials
modules.content: Seebeck and Peltier effect, Thermocouple, Piezoelectric effect, Ceramics.

detailed_syllabus.course_title: Physics of Structural Systems for Civil Engineering

modules.title: Oscillations
modules.content: Free vibrations (SHM), Damped vibrations, Forced vibrations, Resonance.

modules.title: Elasticity
modules.content: Stress/Strain, Hooke's law, Elastic moduli (Young's, Bulk, Rigidity), Beams, Cantilever.

modules.title: Waves And Their Role In Structural Behavior
modules.content: Wave propagation in beams/rods, Earthquakes (P-waves, S-waves), Tsunami, Seismometer.

modules.title: Acoustics, Radiometry and Photometry
modules.content: Reverberation time, Sabine's formula, Sound insulation. Photometry laws.

modules.title: Materials Characterization and Instrumentation Techniques
modules.content: Crystal systems, Miller indices, XRD, Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM).

detailed_syllabus.course_title: Physics of Materials for Mechanical Engineering Stream

modules.title: Oscillations
modules.content: Free vibrations (SHM), Damped vibrations, Forced vibrations, Resonance.

modules.title: Elasticity
modules.content: Stress/Strain, Elastic moduli relations, Beams, Cantilever depression.

modules.title: Thermoelectric Materials And Properties
modules.content: Seebeck/Peltier effect, Thermal conductivity, Wiedemann-Franz law.

modules.title: Cryogenics
modules.content: Joule Thomson effect, Liquefaction of oxygen/helium, Cryogenic engines (CE-20).

modules.title: Materials Characterization and Instrumentation Techniques
modules.content: Miller indices, XRD, Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM).

modules.title: Introduction & Orthographic Projections
modules.content: BIS Conventions, CAD software intro. Projections of points, straight lines, and plane surfaces.

modules.title: Projections of solids
modules.content: Projections of regular upright solids: tetrahedron, cube, prism, pyramid, cylinder, cone.

modules.title: Isometric Projection & 3-D Modelling
modules.content: Isometric scale, Isometric projection of simple plane figures and solids. 3-D modelling of simple components.

modules.title: Development of lateral surfaces
modules.content: Development of right regular prisms, cylinders, pyramids, and cones.

modules.title: Multidisciplinary Applications
modules.content: Stream specific applications: Building components (Civil), Machine parts (Mech), Circuit drawing (Electrical), Network topology (CSE).

modules.title: Introduction to building science
modules.content: Civil Engineering disciplines, Basic Materials (Cement, Bricks, Concrete), Building components.

modules.title: Sustainable Construction Practices
modules.content: Green Buildings, Green Materials (Mud blocks, Bamboo), IGBC/LEED rating systems.

modules.title: Force Systems: Resultant of coplanar forces
modules.content: Parallelogram law, Resolution of forces, Moment, Couple, Varignon's theorem.

modules.title: Force systems: Equilibrium of coplanar forces
modules.content: Free body diagram, Lami's Theorem, Equilibrium of concurrent/non-concurrent systems.

modules.title: Centroid of Plane lamina
modules.content: Locating centroid of rectangle, triangle, circle, semicircle using integration.

modules.title: Power Generation & DC Circuits
modules.content: Energy sources (Wind, Solar), DC circuits, Ohm's/Kirchhoff's laws.

modules.title: AC Circuits
modules.content: Single/Three phase supplies, RMS/Average value, R-L-C series circuits, Power factor.

modules.title: DC Generator & Motor
modules.content: Principle of operation, EMF expression, Torque equation, Types of motors.

modules.title: Transformers & Electric Vehicles
modules.content: Transformer principle, EMF equation, Losses. Introduction to EVs.

modules.title: Domestic Wiring & Safety
modules.content: Two-way/Three-way control, Electricity Billing, Fuse/MCB, Earthing, Electric shock safety.

modules.title: Basic Electronic devices
modules.content: PN junction, Diode, Power Supplies (Rectifiers, Filters), BJT structure, Amplifiers.

modules.title: Operational amplifiers & Oscillators
modules.content: Ideal op-amp, Inverting/Non-inverting, Integrator. Oscillators: Wein bridge, Crystal.

modules.title: Communication
modules.content: Communication system scheme, Modulation (AM/FM), Cellular Communication, Computer Networks.

modules.title: Embedded Systems
modules.content: Microprocessor vs Microcontroller, RISC vs CISC. Sensors, Actuators, LED Display.

modules.title: Boolean Algebra and Logic Circuits
modules.content: Number systems, Logic Gates, Boolean Algebra, Half/Full Adders.

modules.title: Introduction to Mechanical Engineering
modules.content: Role in Society, Energy Sources (Hydel, Solar, Wind), Power Plants.

modules.title: Fundamentals of Machine Tools and Operations
modules.content: Lathe, Milling, Drilling. CNC, 3D printing.

modules.title: Introduction to IC Engines
modules.content: 4-Stroke engines (petrol/diesel), Electric and Hybrid Vehicles.

modules.title: Materials and its Industrial Applications
modules.content: Metals, Ceramics, Composites, Smart materials. Soldering, Brazing, Welding.

modules.title: Introduction to Robotics and Mechatronics
modules.content: Robot anatomy, Mechatronic systems, Automation, Drones/UAV.

modules.title: Data Storage and Manipulation
modules.content: Bits, Main Memory, Binary System, Computer Architecture, Machine Language, Program Execution.

modules.title: Operating Systems & Algorithms
modules.content: OS Architecture, Scheduling, Security. Algorithm concept, Representation, Discovery.

modules.title: Networking and the Internet
modules.content: Network Fundamentals, WWW, Protocols. Cybersecurity overview. Ethical Issues.

modules.title: Software Engineering & Database
modules.content: Software Engineering Discipline, Life Cycle. Database Fundamentals, Relational Model.

modules.title: Introduction to HTML and Computer Graphics
modules.content: HTML, CSS, Website Design. 3D Graphics, Modeling, Rendering.

modules.title: Coplanar force system: Resultant of Forces
modules.content: Resolution of forces, Moment, Couple, Varignon's theorem.

modules.title: Coplanar force system: Equilibrium of Forces
modules.content: Lami's theorem, Equilibrium of concurrent/non-concurrent systems. Support reactions.

modules.title: Friction
modules.content: Static/Kinetic friction, Laws of friction, Ladder friction.

modules.title: Centroid
modules.content: Centroid of plane areas, Composite areas.

modules.title: Moment of Inertia of plane Areas
modules.content: Parallel/Perpendicular axes theorem, Radius of gyration.

modules.title: DC circuits & Electromagnetism
modules.content: Ohm's/Kirchhoff's laws, Star-delta. Faraday's laws, Inductance.

modules.title: Network Theorem
modules.content: Thevenin's, Superposition, Norton's, Maximum Power Transfer Theorem.

modules.title: Single-phase Circuits
modules.content: Sinusoidal voltage generation, Phasor representation, R-L-C circuits, Power calculation.

modules.title: Three-phase Circuits
modules.content: Star and Delta connections, Balanced loads, 2-wattmeter method.

modules.title: Domestic Wiring & Safety
modules.content: Two-way/Three-way control, Tariff, Fuse/MCB, Earthing.

modules.title: Semiconductor Diode & Applications
modules.content: Diode characteristics, Rectifiers (Half/Full), Zener Diode regulator.

modules.title: Bipolar Junction Transistors
modules.content: BJT configurations, Biasing, Transistor as Switch, Feedback principle.

modules.title: Operational Amplifiers
modules.content: Ideal Op-Amp, Inverting/Non-Inverting, Summer, Integrator, Differentiator.

modules.title: Communication
modules.content: Modulation (AM/FM), Cellular Communication, Computer Networks.

modules.title: Digital Electronics and Number Systems
modules.content: Number systems, Logic Gates, Boolean Algebra, Adders, Flip-flops (SR, D, T, JK).

modules.title: An Overview of C, Expressions, Console I/O
modules.content: Flowchart, C History, Compilation, Data Types, Variables, Operators, Printf(), Scanf().

modules.title: Statements
modules.content: Selection Statements (if/switch), Iteration Statements (loops), Jump Statements.

modules.title: Arrays, Strings and Pointers
modules.content: Arrays (1D/2D), Strings. Pointer variables, Pointer Arithmetic, Pointers and Arrays.

modules.title: Functions
modules.content: Function Scope, Arguments, Recursion, Function Prototypes, Pointers to Functions.

modules.title: Structures, Unions, Enumerations, and typedef
modules.content: Structures, Arrays of Structures, Unions, Bit-Fields, Enumerations, typedef.

modules.title: Basics of Biology
modules.content: Prokaryotic/Eukaryotic cells, Biomolecules (Carbohydrates, Proteins, DNA/RNA).

modules.title: Overview of Biotechnology
modules.content: Medical, Agricultural, Industrial, Environmental Biotechnology. Probiotics, Bioinformatics.

modules.title: Biotechnology Processes & Sustainability
modules.content: Bioprocess stages, Bio Ethanol, Circular bioeconomy, IPR issues, GI tags.

modules.title: AI in Biological Research
modules.content: AI in genomics, drug development, medical imaging, personalized medicine, agriculture.

modules.title: Bioinspired Engineering and applications
modules.content: Biomimetics, Bioinspired materials (nacre, spider silk), Locomotion, Self-cleaning surfaces.

modules.title: Communication & Self-Awareness
modules.content: Principles of clear communication, Persuasion, SWOC analysis, Active Listening.

modules.title: Emotional Skills I
modules.content: Emotional Intelligence (EI), Stress Management, Time Management, Adaptability & Resilience.

modules.title: Emotional Skills II
modules.content: Ambition & Goal Setting (SMART goals), Sympathy & Empathy, Creativity & Innovation.

modules.title: Professional Skills I
modules.content: Problem Solving (5 Whys), Discipline, Time Management (Eisenhower Matrix).

modules.title: Professional Skills II
modules.content: Collaboration & Teamwork, Negotiation & Conflict Resolution, Critical Thinking.

modules.title: Introduction
modules.content: Scope and importance, steps in design thinking: Empathize, Define, Ideate, Prototype, Test.

modules.title: Empathy
modules.content: Role in creation of successful products, Skills needed to implement design thinking.

modules.title: Tools for Design Thinking
modules.content: Creativity, ideation methods: mind mapping, brainstorming, story boarding, root cause analysis.

modules.title: Prototyping and Testing
modules.content: Virtual/3D printing, Simulation. Testing: destructive, non-destructive, user testing.

modules.title: Application of Design Thinking in IT
modules.content: Business Process modeling, Agile in Virtual collaboration environment.

modules.title: Introduction
modules.content: Kannada Script, Personal Pronouns, Interrogative words.

modules.title: Grammar I
modules.content: Possessive forms of nouns, Adjectives (Qualitative/Quantitative), Numerals, Locative Case.

modules.title: Grammar II
modules.content: Dative cases, Plural markers, Defective/Negative Verbs, Colour Adjectives.

modules.title: Imperatives & Verbs
modules.content: Permission, Commands, Accusative Cases, Helping verbs (iru/iralla).

modules.title: Vocabulary
modules.content: Comparative, Relationship, Identification and Negation Words.

modules.title: Graph Theory
modules.content: Types of graphs, Eulerian/Hamiltonian graphs, Matrix representation, Trees, Kruskal's & Dijkstra's algorithms.

modules.title: Probability Distributions
modules.content: Discrete (Poisson, Geometric) and Continuous (Exponential, Gaussian, Gamma) distributions.

modules.title: Joint Probability And Markov Chain
modules.content: Joint random variables, Covariance, Correlation. Markov Chain, Stochastic matrix, Stationary distribution.

modules.title: Statistical Inference
modules.content: Testing of hypothesis, Large/Small sample tests, t-test, F-distribution, Chi-Square goodness of fit.

modules.title: Combinatorics
modules.content: Binomial/multinomial theorems, Catalan numbers, Inclusion and exclusion, Derangements, Rook Polynomials.

modules.title: Basic Structure of Computers
modules.content: Functional Units, Addressing Modes, Instruction Sequencing, Number Representation.

modules.title: Introduction to Assembly Language
modules.content: Stacks, Subroutines, Interrupts, DMA, Bus Structure.

modules.title: Memory System
modules.content: RAM, ROM, Cache Memories (Mapping Functions), Virtual Memory.

modules.title: Arithmetic
modules.content: Fast Multiplication (Bit-Pair Recoding), Carry-Save Addition, IEEE Floating Point Operations.

modules.title: Basic Processing Unit & Parallelism
modules.content: Hardwired Control, Instruction Execution, Multithreading, Vector Processing, Multiprocessors.

modules.title: Java Fundamentals
modules.content: Data Types, Operators, Control Statements, Classes, Objects, Constructors, Garbage Collection.

modules.title: Inheritance & String Handling
modules.content: Method Overloading/Overriding, Abstract classes, String operations, StringBuffer.

modules.title: Packages, Interfaces & Generics
modules.content: Packages, Access Protection, Interfaces, Generic classes.

modules.title: Exception Handling & Multithreading
modules.content: Try-catch-finally, User-defined exceptions. Thread creation, Synchronization.

modules.title: I/O & Event Handling
modules.content: Stream classes, Delegation Event Model, AWT Windows, Graphics, Mouse Events.

modules.title: Simplification of Boolean Expressions
modules.content: Karnaugh Maps (4-variable), Quine-McClusky Method.

modules.title: Combinational Circuits
modules.content: Comparators, Decoders, Encoders, Multiplexers, Demultiplexers.

modules.title: Programmable Logic Devices & Flip-Flops
modules.content: PLAs, PALs. SR, D, JK, T Flip Flops, Master Slave JK.

modules.title: Counters
modules.content: Binary Ripple Counters, Synchronous Counters using JK Flip Flops.

modules.title: Synchronous Sequential Circuits
modules.content: Design of Synchronous Sequential circuits, State Transition Diagram.

modules.title: Introduction & SQL
modules.content: Three schema architecture, SQL Data Definition, Queries, Views, Triggers.

modules.title: Entity-Relationship Model
modules.content: Entity types, Attributes, Relationships, ER Diagrams, Relational Mapping.

modules.title: Relational Algebra & Normalization
modules.content: Relational Operations. Functional Dependencies, Normal Forms (1NF, 2NF, 3NF, BCNF, 4NF, 5NF).

modules.title: Transaction Processing
modules.content: ACID properties, Serializability, Two-Phase Locking, ARIES Recovery.

modules.title: NoSQL & Vector Databases
modules.content: NoSQL characteristics, MongoDB implementation. Vector Index, Vector database working.

modules.title: Introduction & Stacks
modules.content: Pointers, Dynamic Memory. Stack operations, Infix to Postfix, Recursion.

modules.title: Queues
modules.content: Linear, Circular, Priority, and Double Ended Queues.

modules.title: Linked Lists
modules.content: Singly, Circular, Doubly Linked Lists. Polynomial manipulation, Sparse matrices.

modules.title: Trees
modules.content: Binary Trees, Traversals, Binary Search Trees (BST), Applications.

modules.title: Graphs & Hashing
modules.content: BFS, DFS. Hash Tables, Collision resolution (Chaining, Open Addressing).

modules.title: Overview of UNIX
modules.content: Architecture, Kernel/Shell, Basic Commands (cal, date, who, ls).

modules.title: File System
modules.content: File permissions, commands (cat, cp, rm, grep, chmod).

modules.title: Process Control
modules.content: Hard/Symbolic links. Process states, ps command, Background jobs.

modules.title: Shell Programming
modules.content: Shell variables, Environment variables, Read/Echo, Exit status.

modules.title: Control Structures
modules.content: Branching, Loops, Command Substitution, Command Line Arguments.

modules.title: Continuous Optimization - 1
modules.content: Convex sets, Hessian matrix, Gradient descent, Newton-Raphson method.

modules.title: Continuous Optimization - 2
modules.content: Lagrange multipliers, KKT conditions, Fibonacci search.

modules.title: Inner Product Spaces
modules.content: Gram-Schmidt process, QR-factorization, Least squares problem.

modules.title: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors
modules.content: Cayley-Hamilton Theorem, Jordan Canonical form.

modules.title: Matrix Decomposition
modules.content: Singular Value Decomposition (SVD), PCA, Quadratic forms.

modules.title: Introduction
modules.content: Security Goals, Modular Arithmetic, Substitution/Transposition Ciphers.

modules.title: Symmetric Key Ciphers
modules.content: DES Structure, AES Transformations, Block/Stream Ciphers.

modules.title: Math of Asymmetric Cryptography
modules.content: Primes, Chinese Remainder Theorem, Quadratic Congruence.

modules.title: Asymmetric Cryptography
modules.content: RSA, ElGamal, Elliptic Curve Cryptography, SHA-512.

modules.title: Message Integrity & Key Management
modules.content: Digital Signatures, Kerberos, Diffie-Hellman Key Agreement.

modules.title: Finite Automata
modules.content: DFA, NFA, Epsilon Transitions, Text Search Application.

modules.title: Regular Expressions
modules.content: Regular Languages, Pumping Lemma, Minimization of Automata.

modules.title: Context Free Grammars
modules.content: Derivations, Parse Trees, Ambiguity, CNF, GNF.

modules.title: Pushdown Automata
modules.content: PDA Definition, Equivalence of PDA and CFG, Pumping Lemma for CFL.

modules.title: Turing Machines
modules.content: TM Definition, Halting Problem, Undecidability, Post's Correspondence Problem.

modules.title: Introduction & Processes
modules.content: OS Structure, System Calls. Process Concept, PCB, Operations on Processes.

modules.title: Scheduling & Threads
modules.content: Multithreading Models. CPU Scheduling Algorithms (FCFS, SJF, RR).

modules.title: Synchronization & Deadlocks
modules.content: Semaphores, Mutex, Dining Philosophers. Deadlock Prevention, Avoidance, Detection.

modules.title: Memory Management
modules.content: Paging, Segmentation. Virtual Memory, Page Replacement Algorithms.

modules.title: File Systems & Protection
modules.content: Directory Structure, Allocation Methods. Disk Scheduling. Access Matrix.

modules.title: Analysis Framework
modules.content: Asymptotic Notations, Recurrences, Master Theorem.

modules.title: Brute Force & Divide-and-Conquer
modules.content: Exhaustive Search, Merge Sort, Quick Sort, Strassen's Matrix Multiplication.

modules.title: Decrease/Transform-and-Conquer
modules.content: DFS/BFS, Topological Sorting, Heapsort, Horner's Rule.

modules.title: Dynamic Programming & Greedy
modules.content: Knapsack Problem, Floyd's Algorithm. Prim's, Kruskal's, Dijkstra's Algorithms.

modules.title: Backtracking & NP-Completeness
modules.content: N-Queens, Subset-Sum. P, NP, NP-Complete classes.

modules.title: Process Models
modules.content: SDLC, Agile, Waterfall. Functional/Non-functional Requirements.

modules.title: Design
modules.content: Architectural Design, Object-Oriented Design, UML Models.

modules.title: Project Management
modules.content: Estimation (LOC, FP), Project Scheduling, Risk Management.

modules.title: Development & Evolution
modules.content: Agile methods (XP, Scrum). Legacy system evolution.

modules.title: Verification & Validation
modules.content: Testing strategies (System, Component), Test case design, Automation.

modules.title: Introduction to Value Education
modules.content: Self-Exploration, Natural Acceptance, Happiness and Prosperity.

modules.title: Harmony in the Human Being
modules.content: Self ('I') and 'Body', Sanyam and Health.

modules.title: Harmony in Family and Society
modules.content: Trust, Respect, Justice in relationships. Universal Human Goals.

modules.title: Harmony in Nature
modules.content: Coexistence, Holistic perception of harmony.

modules.title: Professional Ethics
modules.content: Ethical Human Conduct, Natural acceptance of human values.

all_subjects.title: Robot Process Automation Design and Development
Product, Services and IT Service Management

modules.title: Class Modeling
modules.content: Object/Class concepts, Associations, Generalization, Aggregation, Abstract classes, Multiple inheritance.

modules.title: State Modeling
modules.content: Events, States, Transitions, State diagrams, Nested state diagrams, Concurrency.

modules.title: Interaction Modeling
modules.content: Use case models, Sequence models, Activity models.

modules.title: Domain & Application Analysis
modules.content: Domain class/state models. Application interaction/class models.

modules.title: Design Patterns
modules.content: Forwarder-Receiver, Client-Dispatcher-Server, Publisher-Subscriber.

modules.title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
modules.content: Data Types, Measurement Scales, EDA vs Classical Analysis.

modules.title: Transformation Techniques
modules.content: Data deduplication, Binning, Handling missing data (Imputation).

modules.title: Descriptive Statistics
modules.content: Central tendency, Dispersion, Correlation. Time Series Analysis.

modules.title: Visualizing Data
modules.content: Histograms, Density Plots, Q-Q Plots, Visualizing Multiple Distributions.

modules.title: Pandas & Wrangling
modules.content: DataFrames, Data Cleaning, Merging/Reshaping Data Sets, Web Scraping.

modules.title: Introduction
modules.content: Intelligent Agents, Environment types, Problem-solving agents.

modules.title: Search Strategies
modules.content: BFS, DFS, Iterative Deepening, A* Search, Hill Climbing, Simulated Annealing.

modules.title: Logical Agents
modules.content: Propositional Logic, First Order Logic (Syntax/Semantics), Wumpus World.

modules.title: Inference & Games
modules.content: Forward/Backward Chaining, Resolution. Minimax, Alpha-Beta Pruning.

modules.title: Uncertain Knowledge
modules.content: Bayes Rule, Bayesian Networks, Probabilistic Reasoning.

modules.title: Introduction & Application Layer
modules.content: OSI/TCP-IP Models. HTTP, DNS, SNMP.

modules.title: Transport Layer
modules.content: UDP, TCP Protocol mechanisms.

modules.title: Network Layer
modules.content: IPv4, IPv6, Routing Algorithms (RIP), Unicast Routing.

modules.title: Data Link Layer
modules.content: Error Detection (CRC), MAC protocols (Random Access), Ethernet.

modules.title: Physical Layer
modules.content: Digital Transmission, Switching (Circuit/Packet).

modules.title: Introduction to Environment
modules.content: Atmosphere structure, Ecosystems, Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA).

modules.title: Natural Resources
modules.content: Water resources, Mineral resources, Forest resources.

modules.title: Energy Resources
modules.content: Renewable (Solar, Wind) and Non-conventional energy resources.

modules.title: Environmental Pollution
modules.content: Water, Land, and Noise pollution control.

modules.title: Current Environmental Issues
modules.content: Global warming, Acid rain, Ozone depletion, Role of NGOs.

detailed_syllabus.course_title: Robot Process Automation Design and Development

modules.title: Robotic Process Automation
modules.content: Benefits, RPA platforms, UiPath Studio intro, Task Recorder.

modules.title: Sequence & Data Manipulation
modules.content: Flowcharts, Control flow, Data table usage, CSV/Excel operations.

modules.title: UI Controls & Plugins
modules.content: Selectors, Screen scraping, OCR, Mail/PDF plugins.

modules.title: User Events & Debugging
modules.content: Assistant bots, Event triggers, Exception handling, Logging.

modules.title: Deploying Bots
modules.content: Project Organization, Reusability, Orchestrator Server, Deploying bots.

modules.title: Lexical Analysis
modules.content: Structure of Compilers, Input Buffering, Token Recognition.

modules.title: Syntax Analysis
modules.content: Top-down vs Bottom-up Parsing, LR Parsers.

modules.title: Syntax-Directed Translation
modules.content: SDT Schemes, Evaluation order, Applications.

modules.title: Intermediate Code Generation
modules.content: Three-address code, Syntax trees, Control flow.

modules.title: Code Generation
modules.content: Basic blocks, Flow graphs, Optimization, Register allocation.

modules.title: Hardware & Primitives
modules.content: Raster-Scan Systems, OpenGL Point/Line/Curve functions.

modules.title: Fill-Area Primitives
modules.content: Polygon Fill, Pixel Arrays, Character Primitives, OpenGL Attributes.

modules.title: Algorithms & Transformations
modules.content: Line/Circle algorithms, 2D Geometric Transformations (Matrix representation).

modules.title: 2D Viewing
modules.content: Clipping Window, Viewport transformation, Clipping Algorithms (Cohen-Sutherland).

modules.title: 3D Viewing
modules.content: 3D Viewing Pipeline, Projections (Orthogonal, Perspective), 3D Clipping.

modules.title: Dynamic Programming
modules.content: Matrix-chain multiplication, LCS, Edit Distance, Egg Dropping Puzzle.

modules.title: Maximum Flow & Multithreading
modules.content: Ford-Fulkerson, Bipartite matching. Multithreaded algorithms.

modules.title: String Matching
modules.content: Rabin-Karp, KMP algorithm.

modules.title: Linear Programming
modules.content: Simplex algorithm, Formulating linear programs.

modules.title: Computational Geometry & Approx Algo
modules.content: Convex hull, Closest pair. Approximation for TSP, Set-covering.

detailed_syllabus.course_title: Product, Services and IT Service Management

modules.title: Overview of Products and IT Services
modules.content: Industrial revolutions, IT Infrastructure, Cloud computing, Application management.
